timeline.bodyText: Speaking of which: Can you please also provide getCatalogName that should be used instead of toString
timeline.author: kokosing

replies.bodyText:
I thought about that. But i realized having toString() which behaves differently would be very error-prone.
And thus having a dedicated get method is redundant.
I will add javadoc to toString to guarantee current behavior.
replies.author: findepi

timeline.author: kokosing

replies.bodyText: that would call for not using catalogName directly, only via guice. beyond scope.
replies.author: findepi
